website_summaries.verdict: A stylish addition to your office or living room and easy to move around as needed.
pros: Sturdy and holds up well over time

customer_reviews.title: I imagine that most people would be more satisfied but this is my second one and the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I imagine that most people would be more satisfied but this is my second one and the first one was much nicer. I loved the first one. I thought I was buying the same product as before but was disappointed when I received a lesser quality product. The current iteration arrives folded with a divider insert where the older model was all one rigid piece. I should have been suspicious when I saw that the price had dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Win In The Pines

customer_reviews.title: This product is FOLDABLE! May lack durability for its intended use.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when i received this FLATTEN magazine rack! Nowwhere in the description or name did it mention that this magazine rack is foldable. Altho i havent used it yet (it is a gift for my kids), i cannot imagine that its a durable product for magazines...& it was sold at a hefty price for a flimsy item...I had many other choices in the same price range, but the "look" of this one is what appealed to me....I feel i overpaid, for an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: amg

customer_reviews.title: This is the best magazine file I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best magazine file I've ever seen. I am actually using it for holding file folders. I bought really cute black and white file folders from an office supply store, but I never could find a proper holder. This is almost perfect. My dream magazine basket would be just like this but not so tall, so that the really cute file folders could be seen better poking out the top. But this is still very attractive AND very functional. It is really easy to lift because of the handles and is very sturdily constructed. It holds a lot of file folders and looks fashionable sitting out on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: CatholicMomof7

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and plenty sturdy for holding my journals and pens/markers. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This collapsible magazine holder is perfect for storing my reading materials next to my recliner. When assembled, it measures 13.5-inches long x 8-inches wide x 10.5-inches tall. Plenty of room for magazines, books, etc. And, it's more appealing than a cardboard box, which was what I had been using!! I like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dawson III

customer_reviews.title: A Simple, and elegant way to organize all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of the Blu Monaco leather magazine holder, whatever you place in it; magazines, books or files looks neat, and organized, instantly. The quality is impressive for the price. Highly recommended this product to organize yourself in a flash,
customer_reviews.author: Patty's picks

customer_reviews.title: Nifty organizer for music folders and sheet music
customer_reviews.text: This thing brought order to our piano. Dozens of those little books my son uses for lessons, looseleaf scores, notes, and folders fit in here. It completely tamed the pile of papers that had been scattered everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gitzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Classy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Needed a place to put all my random sheet music next to the piano (piano bench is full). This looks really classy and is quite large so everything fits. Love the handles in case it needs to be picked up and moved or rifled through. Very sturdy and durable, looks great just sitting there on the floor, not like something that needs to be put away.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great magazine or book rack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my piano books and love it - looks classy, wellmade and sturdy, and holds those heavy books without collapsing!

customer_reviews.title: Holds a Lot of Magazines
customer_reviews.text: If you like to hang onto lots of magazines, this holder is for you. Keep this on the bathroom floor with at least 20 magazines standing upright (with space for lots more)! There is space to put the magazines sideways but this keeps them from sliding. If you only keep a few mags in there at a time, you might do better with a smaller holder.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I had a mess on my counter with paperwork and magazines just spilling out of the previous container. This item is perfect! It doesn’t take up much space but holds a lot! It is sturdy and keeps my counter tidy. And with the high sides you don’t see all the stuff in it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This magazine rack is AWESOME! I love how it comes collapsed, and you just insert the piece of covered cardboard for the bottom. This is large enough to hold TONS of magazines for our bathroom. Would definitely buy again!

product_meta.title: Blu Monaco - Quality Leather Magazine Holder - Basket with Handles - Magazine Rack - Floor or Table - (Woven Black) - Great Stand for Coffee Table, Side Table, Living Room, Reception Desk, Bathroom
feature_bullets: MADE WITH QUALITY MATERIALS: Constructed of high quality, sturdy paperboard and covered with beautiful PVC black leather, this black leather magazine rack is a beautiful addition to your home.

HOME OFFICE AND LIVING ROOM STORAGE WITH STYLE: This cute magazine file holder is the perfect combination of functional and fashionable. With its unique woven design, large capacity and neutral color, this book basket will be perfect in any area of your home or office.

USE IT ANYWHERE: Wherever you need storage in your home or office, on the floor or tabletop, or as bathroom magazine holder rack, this faux leather magazine holder is perfect. Place it by a chair with your favorite books or magazines, or by the entryway for mail and paperwork.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS: This decorative magazine rack isn’t just for magazine storage; its large capacity means you can store just about anything in this bin. Small items like scarves, shoes, electronics, iPad, tablets, yarn, toilet rolls, laptop; whatever you can imagine, you can store it in this tall magazine basket with handles.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If you are not satisfied with this wide magazine living room storage basket bin stand, simply return within 90 days for a full refund. Makes a great gift like dorm room decor for girls. GREAT FOR BACK TO SCHOOL.
